articles.description: Essex bowler Sam Cook is in line for an England debut after being named in the squad for the one-off Test against Zimbabwe at Trent Bridge.
articles.title: Sam Cook in line for England debut after being named in squad for Zimbabwe Test

articles.description: All the reaction as Manchester United and Tottenham win Europa League semi-final first legs, and Chelsea win Conference League semi-final first leg; plus Premier League news conferences.
articles.title: Europa League reaction: Man Utd, Tottenham win, plus Chelsea victory

articles.description: Zhao Xintong produces a scintillating display of potting to open up a 12-4 lead against seven-time winner Ronnie O'Sullivan in their World Championship semi-final.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025: Zhao Xintong dominates Ronnie O'Sullivan in Crucible semi-final

articles.description: The odds are looking favourable for a sixth all-English European final, after Manchester United and Tottenham both win semi-final first legs on Thursday.
articles.title: Europa League: Manchester United to meet Tottenham in all-English final?

articles.description: The England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB) bar transgender women from women's cricket with immediate effect.
articles.title: ECB says transgender women cannot compete in women's cricket with immediate effect

articles.description: Ruben Amorim said "nobody expected" Manchester United's win at Athletic Bilbao, but was it the best of his tenure so far?
articles.title: Athletic Bilbao 0-3 Man Utd: Ruben Amorim's best result as manager?

articles.description: The New York Knicks will take on the Boston Celtics in the Eastern Conference semi-finals as they see off the Detroit Pistons.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: New York Knicks beat Detroit Pistons

articles.description: Justin Kluivert says he feels at home at Bournemouth after a career that has taken him through the Netherlands, Italy, Germany, France, Spain and now England.
articles.title: Justin Kluivert on Bournemouth's European and Premier League ambitions

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on British-Colombian singer-songwriter Sasha Keable with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v British-Colombian singer Sasha Keable

articles.description: Eddie Howe says that Joelinton's injury is 'nothing serious' but he is unlikely to play again this season.
articles.title: Joelinton unlikely to play for Newcastle again this season, says boss Eddie Howe
